title: Chocolate Molds, DIY 2PCS Silicone 15-Cavity Dimpled Cake Mold Valentine's Day Love Heart Shape Engagement Wedding for Chocolates, Hard Candy, Baking, Gummy, Jelly, Fat Bombs, Ice Cube Trays
description: Features:?Wide Application:This tool will help bring your crafting or cake decorating skills to a new level, ideal for use with a wide range of edible and non edible materials, can be applied for making cake or cupcake decoration, candy, chocolate, fondant, ice cube, cookie, jelly and more.?Durable to use:Made of quality silicone material, durable and flexible to use, heat resistance up to 446 degrees Fahrenheit, cold resistance can reach -40 degrees Fahrenheit, microwave safe, oven safe, and dishwasher safe.?Specifications:Material: siliconeColor: as pictures shownSize: as pictures shownPackage includes:2 x Heart shaped silicone molds?Use and maintenance: ?After each use, wash in the dishwasher or use hot water to clean. Make sure the silicone mold clean before each use and dry completely before storage. ?The silicon mold can be applied only for the oven, oven and microwave oven, never can be placed directly on the gas stove and induction cooker, or direct heating use. ?The silicone mold is dust absorptive, you put in the carton, placed in the shade when you don't use it for long time. ?It is best to apply a little butter or oil before making.?Notice: The actual color may vary slightly from the online image due to monitor color settings. Please allow slight measurement deviation for the data.
